item.title: How to Create a Webserver in Golang
item.description:
To create a web server in Go, you can use the http package provided by the standard library. This package includes the http.Server type, which represents an HTTP server, and the http.ListenAndServe() function, which listens for incoming HTTP requests on a specified port and…

To create a web server in Go, you can use the http package provided by the standard library. This package includes the http.Server type, which represents an HTTP server, and the http.ListenAndServe() function, which listens for incoming HTTP requests on a specified port and serves responses to those requests.
